oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Hall of Fame trip interview and commentary - Biff Collie - KFOX
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Jo Walker and commentary while touring the Country Music Hall of Fame, as conducted by Biff Collie for radio station KFOX (Long Beach, Calif.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:18) Dodge commercial -- (00:38) Biff Collie talks about the Country Music Hall of Fame plaque as you enter the Hall -- (01:15) Jo Walker talks with Biff, and wants people from KFOX to come by more often -- (01:52) KFOX commercial -- (02:18) Jo Walker talks about her visit to the White House -- (03:15) Walker talks about being a guest of the President and first lady -- (04:21) Chevrolet commercial -- (05:03) Biff Collie talks about Jimmie Rodgers legacy and influence on country music, and his hall of fame induction plaque -- (06:00) Biff talks about Jimmie Rodgers being the first member of the hall of fame -- (07:00) Biff talks about Hank Williams influence on country music and his plaque at the hall of fame -- (08:00) Hank Williams talks about being inducted [recorded excerpt] -- (09:15) KFOX commercial -- (09:34) Biff talks about Roy Acuff and his plaque in the hall of fame -- (11:26) Biff Collie talks about Tex Ritter, his plaque in the hall of fame, and his success in both music and film -- (12:15) Biff talks about seeing Tex Ritter the previous week during his campaign for state senator of Tennessee -- (14:35) KFOX commercial -- (14:53) Biff Collie talks about Ernest Tubb and his plaque in the hall of fame -- Biff talks about Tubb being the first artist in the world to use an amplified guitar in his band -- (16:28) KFOX commercial -- (16:44) OS Peterson furniture commercial -- (17:07) Biff Collie talks about Uncle Dave Macon, his legacy and joining the Grand Ole Opry -- Uncle Dave Macon talks and performs [recorded excerpt -- (18:00) Biff talks about Uncle Dave Macon's plaque in the hall of fame -- (18:44) KFOX commercial -- (19:00) Biff talks about Eddy Arnold's legacy and his plaque in the hall of fame -- (22:21) KFOX commercial -- (23:02) Biff talks about Jim Reeves -- Jim Reeves talks with Biff about wanting to be a baseball player, suffering an injury, and later finding talent in music [recorded excerpt] -- (23:52) Biff talks about Jim Reeve's plaque in the hall of fame and his death in a plane crash
